cast.overview: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.
cast.title: Spotlight

details.biography: Robert Clarke is a Canadian actor who has appeared in numerous film and television productions. He starred in The 6th Day (2000), Rampage (2009), Spotlight (2015), and The Perfect Pairing (2022). In addition to his film roles, he has also appeared in various series, including Arrow, The Flash, Supernatural, and Da Vinci’s Inquest.
details.name: Robert Clarke
